if nothing is changed on screen

ExpSyntax.val: InStr ({1,2},'M')>0 AND {1,4}<>'Q' AND (VarMod ('{0,3}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,4}'VAR) OR VarMod ('{0,5}'VAR))

Text.val: Data has changed ... ask for confirmation
Data has not changed ... just exit
